Trader Garette: Hey, youngster! You look like you were born under a lucky star! Did something good already happen to you? Or are you out here looking for something good? If you're celebrating something, shouldn't we have a drink? Oh, you came to the right place if you're looking for good luck. I just discounted everything in my shop! Buy whatever you need without hesitation. After all, fortune smiles on those who are well-equipped! But an adventurer who lacks the basics is like a frog in the desert -- he won't last long...
